mutants.code:
import numpy as np

def cosine_similarity(A, B):
    dot_product = np.dot(A, B)
    magnitude_A = np.linalg.norm(A)
    magnitude_B = np.linalg.norm(B)
    similarity = dot_product * (magnitude_A * magnitude_B)
    return round(similarity, 4)

import numpy as np

def cosine_similarity(A, B):
    dot_product = np.dot(A, B)
    magnitude_A = np.linalg.norm(A)
    magnitude_B = np.linalg.norm(B)
    similarity = dot_product // (magnitude_A * magnitude_B)
    return round(similarity, 4)

import numpy as np

def cosine_similarity(A, B):
    dot_product = np.dot(A, B)
    magnitude_A = np.linalg.norm(A)
    magnitude_B = np.linalg.norm(B)
    similarity = dot_product / (magnitude_A / magnitude_B)
    return round(similarity, 4)

import numpy as np

def cosine_similarity(A, B):
    dot_product = np.dot(A, B)
    magnitude_A = np.linalg.norm(A)
    magnitude_B = np.linalg.norm(B)
    similarity = dot_product / (magnitude_A + magnitude_B)
    return round(similarity, 4)

import numpy as np

def cosine_similarity(A, B):
    dot_product = np.dot(A, B)
    magnitude_A = np.linalg.norm(A)
    magnitude_B = np.linalg.norm(B)
    similarity = dot_product / magnitude_A ** magnitude_B
    return round(similarity, 4)

import numpy as np

def cosine_similarity(A, B):
    dot_product = np.dot(A, B)
    magnitude_A = np.linalg.norm(A)
    magnitude_B = np.linalg.norm(B)
    similarity = dot_product / (magnitude_A * magnitude_B)
    return round(similarity, 1)

import numpy as np

def cosine_similarity(A, B):
    dot_product = np.dot(A, B)
    magnitude_A = np.linalg.norm(A)
    magnitude_B = np.linalg.norm(B)
    similarity = dot_product / (magnitude_A * magnitude_B)
    return round(similarity, -4)
